text: The is a member of the Cabinet of Japan. The minister is nominated by the Prime Minister of Japan. The current minister is Taku Etō, who took office on 11 November 2024. == List of ministers of agriculture, forestry and fisheries == Minister Term of office Prime minister # Portrait Name Took office
